name.en: Introduction to Cloud-based Geographic Information System
name.ch: 雲端地理資訊系統通論

goal.ch: 本課程的主要目標為介紹雲端地理資訊系統之背景、設計與建造時所需瞭解的必要知識、及相關應用。本課程亦將引導學生使用網際網路程式設計實作雲端地理資訊系統。
goal.en: The major objective of this course is to introduce the knowledge required for designing and implementing a cloud-based geographic information system, and cloud-based GIS applications. Students will also learn how to implement a cloud-based geographic information system with web programming languages.

outline.ch:
(1) 雲端地理資訊系統之簡介
(2) 雲端地理資訊系統架構
(3) 資料庫管理系統基本觀念
(4) 地理空間網路
(5) 地理資訊混搭
(6) 行動式地理資訊系統
(7) 志願式地理資訊
(8) 感測物聯網
outline.en:
1. Introduction to Cloud-based Geographic Information System
2. Cloud-based Geographic Information System Architecture
3. Fundamental Database Management System Concepts
4. Geospatial Web
5. Geospatial Mash-up
6. Mobile GIS
7. Volunteered Geographic Information
8. Sensor Web and Internet of Things

textbook.ch:
授課教師準備之上課講義。
參考書：
• Fu, P. and Sun, J., 2010. Web GIS: Principles and Applications. 1st edition, ESRI Press: Redlands, USA. ISBN 978-1-58948-245-6.
• Worboys, M. and Duckham, M., 2004. GIS: A Computing Perspective. 2nd edition, CRC Press: Boca Raton, USA. ISBN 0-415-28375-2.
• Rigaux, P., Scholl, M., and Voisard, A., 2002. Spatial Databases: With Application to GIS. 1st edition, Morgan Kaufmann Publishers: San Francisco, USA. ISBN 978-1-55860-588-6.
textbook.en:
Instructor-prepared slides.
References:
• Fu, P. and Sun, J., 2010. Web GIS: Principles and Applications. 1st edition, ESRI Press: Redlands, USA. ISBN 978-1-58948-245-6.
• Worboys, M. and Duckham, M., 2004. GIS: A Computing Perspective. 2nd edition, CRC Press: Boca Raton, USA. ISBN 0-415-28375-2.
• Rigaux, P., Scholl, M., and Voisard, A., 2002. Spatial Databases: With Application to GIS. 1st edition, Morgan Kaufmann Publishers: San Francisco, USA. ISBN

gradMethod.ch:
• 實作成績（30％）
• 學期專案（30％）
• 期末考試（25％）
• 課程參與（15％）
gradMethod.en:
• Labs (30％)
• Term Project (30％)
• Final Exam (25％)
• Course Participation (15％)
